esg.saml.attr.service.api
Interface SAMLAttributeFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
SAMLAttributeFactoryTrivialImpl
public interface SAMLAttributeFactory

Factory to generate a SAMLAttributes object for a given system user. Concrete implementations of this class represent the link to a specific users domain model.

Method Summary
 String getIssuer()
          Method to return the authority that is issuing the attributes.
 SAMLAttributes newInstance(String identifier)
          Factory method to lookup a user by identifier and extract the attributes into a SAMLAttributes object.
